view

Class AbsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.AbsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game2048View, MazeGameView

    public abstract class AbsView
extends java.util.Observable
implements View, java.lang.Runnable
    The Class AbsView. Abstract Class AbsView: This class defines the common parts for classes that run a 2D board game.
